start.description: You are a brave knight on a quest to slay a fearsome dragon. You find yourself at the base of the mountain where the dragon resides.

mountainPath.description: You start climbing the mountain path. It's a treacherous climb, but you manage to avoid falling rocks and other dangers. You come across an old hermit.

choices.option: Ignore the hermit and continue climbing.

hermitAdvice.description: The hermit warns you that the dragon is nearly invincible from the front. To defeat the beast, you must approach it from behind. He then shows you a hidden path.

choices.option: Thank the hermit and take the hidden path.

hiddenPath.description: You follow the hidden path, evading more dangers of the mountain. Finally, you arrive at the dragon's lair, approaching the beast from behind.

darkCave.description: You enter the dark cave and encounter a pack of vicious wolves. You manage to fend them off and continue deeper into the cave.

choices.option: Exit the cave and climb the mountain path.

dragonLair.description: You find yourself in the dragon's lair, facing the fearsome beast head-on. The dragon sees you coming and attacks!

choices.option: Try to sneak around the dragon.

victory.description: You've defeated the mighty dragon and saved the kingdom! Your name will be remembered as a hero!

defeat.description: The dragon breathes fire, and you are defeated. Your quest ends in tragedy.
